template.name: entity
template.content:
<%@ page language="java" contentType="text/html; charset=UTF-8" pageEncoding="UTF-8"%> <%@include file="/resources/inc/taglib.jsp"%>
<#list filedList as filed>

<#if filed.javaType != "Date"> maxlength="${filed.maxlength}" value="${"$"}{${ClassName?uncap_first}.${filed.name}}" class="required" /> <#if filed.javaType == "Date"> " class="date" dateFmt="${filed.dateFmt}" readonly="true"/>
